001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Delete;
006import androidx.room.Insert;
007import androidx.room.Query;
008import androidx.room.Transaction;
009import androidx.room.Update;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo.PatternLocation;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo.PatternWithRows;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
015import java.util.List;
016
017/**
018 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link Pattern} entity instances. {@code INSERT}, {@code UPDATE}, and
019 * {@code DELETE} operations are implemented as ReactiveX {@link Single} tasks, which execute on
020 * subscription; some {@code SELECT} tasks are implemented using {@link LiveData} queries, which
021 * execute on observation, or (if already being observed) on Room-based updates to the underlying
022 * tables.
023 */
024@Dao
025public interface PatternDao {
026
027  /**
028   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
029   * {@code pattern} into the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the
030   * auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
031   *
032   * @param pattern {@link Pattern} instance to be inserted.
033   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code pattern} into the database.
034   */
035  @Insert
036  Single<Long> insert(Pattern pattern);
037
038  /**
039   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a single pattern, using the primary
040   * key value. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code pattern} table are modified using
041   * Room methods), the query is executed.
042   *
043   * @param id Unique identifier (primary key value) of the {@link Pattern} instance of interest.
044   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link Pattern} instance of interest.
045   */
046  @Transaction
047  @Query("SELECT * FROM pattern WHERE pattern_id = :id")
048  LiveData<PatternWithRows> select(Long id);
049
050  /**
051   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
052   * {@code pattern} to the database.
053   *
054   * @param pattern {@link Pattern} instance to be updated.
055   * @return {@link Single} that will update {@code pattern} to the database.
056   */
057  @Update
058  Single<Integer> update(Pattern pattern);
059
060  /**
061   * Updates and passes through a particular pattern, to avoid repeated queries.
062   *
063   * @param pattern {@link Pattern} to be updated.
064   * @return {@link Single} of the updated {@code pattern}.
065   */
066  default Single<Pattern> updateAndPassThrough(Pattern pattern) {
067    return update(pattern)
068        .map((count) -> pattern);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a single pattern, using the primary
073   * key value. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code patternLocation} table are
074   * modified using Room methods), the query is executed.
075   *
076   * @param patternId Unique identifier (primary key value) of the {@link Pattern} instance of
077   *                  interest.
078   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link Pattern} instance of interest.
079   */
080  @Transaction
081  @Query("SELECT p.*, r.current_stitch_id FROM pattern AS p "
082      + "JOIN `row` AS r ON p.current_row_id = r.row_id "
083      + "WHERE p.pattern_id = :patternId")
084  LiveData<PatternLocation> getLocation(long patternId);
085
086  /**
087   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a {@link List} of {@link Pattern}
088   * entities. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code pattern} table are modified using
089   * Room methods), the query is executed.
090   *
091   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link Pattern} instances of interest.
092   */
093  @Query("SELECT * FROM pattern")
094  LiveData<List<Pattern>> select();
095
096  /**
097   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), deletes
098   * {@code pattern} from the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the number
099   * of records modified.
100   *
101   * @param pattern {@link Pattern} instance to be deleted.
102   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) delete {@code pattern} from the database.
103   */
104  @Delete
105  Single<Integer> delete(Pattern pattern);
106
107}
